Description.zhCN:
基础工作单位。用于采集资源、建造人类建筑和修理。

可以对地。
Description.enUS:
Basic work unit. Used to gather resources, construct human structures, and repair.

Can target the ground.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам двигаться в указанную точку или следовать за указанной целью. При этом они не будут вступать в бой с возможным противником.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам прекратить выполнение всех задач и остановиться.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам оставаться на месте и атаковать противника в зоне досягаемости, при этом не преследуя его и не приближаясь к нему, чтобы вступить в бой.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам двигаться в выбранную точку, вступая в бой с противниками, которые встретятся по пути. Указав в качестве цели конкретную боевую единицу, вы прикажете атаковать ее до уничтожения.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам курсировать между текущей позицией и выбранной точкой. Обнаружив противника, они будут приближаться на расстояние атаки и вступать в бой.

Tooltip.zhCN: 能够不消耗资源快速为机械单位和建筑恢复生命值。
Tooltip.enUS: Able to quickly restore health to mechanical units and buildings without consuming resources.
Orders SCV to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказывает КСМ добывать ресурсы на месторождении минералов или из веспенового гейзера.

Tooltip.enUS: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выгрузить ресурсы в ближайший приемный пункт.

Tooltip.enUS: A list of basic structures.
Tooltip.ruRU: Открывает список основных строений.

Tooltip.enUS: A list of advanced structures.
Tooltip.ruRU: Открывает список дополнительных строений.

Tooltip.enUS: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приостановить сооружение этого строения. Впоследствии его можно будет продолжить.

Tooltip.zhCN: 在脱离战斗后能够极快的恢复生命。
Tooltip.enUS: Able to recover health very quickly after being out of combat.

Name.zhCN: 建造特别行动指挥中心
Name.enUS: Construction of Special Operations Command Center

Tooltip.zhCN:
主要建筑
用于接收采集到的资源。能够升空，可升级成为轨道控制中心或特战要塞。

开启：
- 特战SCV
Tooltip.enUS:
Main building
is used to receive collected resources. It can take off and can be upgraded to a Orbital Control Center or Special War Fortress.

Enable:
- Special Warfare SCV

Name.enUS: Construction of Special Warfare Space Station

Tooltip.zhCN:
基础建筑，用于接收采集到的资源。自体可以升空，可以升级成为轨道控制基地或行星要塞。

开启：
- SCV
Tooltip.enUS:
Basic building, used to receive collected resources. The self can be launched into the air and can be upgraded to an orbital control base or planetary fortress.

Enable:
- SCV

Name.zhCN: 建造前线自动化精炼厂

Tooltip.zhCN:
基础建筑
改良型精炼厂，可无需工作单位自动采集高能瓦斯。
Tooltip.enUS:
Basic Building
An improved refinery that can automatically collect high-energy gas without the need for work units.

Tooltip.zhCN:
基础建筑
建造在瓦斯气泉上，用于采集高能瓦斯。
Tooltip.enUS:
Basic building
is built on a gas spring and is used to collect high-energy gas.

Name.zhCN: 建造特别行动补给站

Tooltip.zhCN:
基础建筑
提供补给。
拥有补给是生产更多单位的前提。
补给站可以降下，允许地面单位出入。
Tooltip.enUS:
Basic buildings
provide supplies.
Having supplies is a prerequisite for producing more units.
The supply depot can be lowered, allowing ground units to enter and exit.

Tooltip.zhCN:
生产建筑
特战队基础步兵训练设施。

开启：
- 精英陆战队员
- 特战收割者
- 使特战SCV可以建造强化地堡
- 使特战SCV可以建造特别行动处
- 使特战SCV可以建造特战重工厂
- 使特别行动指挥中心可以升级为轨道控制中心
Tooltip.enUS:
Production Building
Special Forces Basic Infantry Training Facility.

Enable:
- Elite Marine
- < c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Special Combat Reaper
- Enables Special Combat SCV to be constructedFortified Bunker
- Allows Special Warfare SCV to build Special Operations Office< /c>
- Enables Special Warfare SCV to be constructedSpecial Operations Heavy Factory
- Allows Special Operations Command Center to be upgraded to Orbital Control Center

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
解锁特战队防御建筑。

开启：
- 使特战SCV可以建造隐秘导弹塔
- 使特战SCV可以建造隐秘感应塔
- 使特别行动指挥中心可升级为特战要塞
Tooltip.enUS:
Technology Building
Unlocks the Special Forces defense building.

Enable:
- Enables Special Warfare SCV to be constructed Stealth Missile Turret
- Allows Special Warfare SCV to be constructedSecret Sensor Tower
- Allows the Special Operations Command Center to be upgraded to a Special Operations Command Center Battle Fortress

Tooltip.zhCN:
防御建筑
能够装载步兵的基础防御建筑。

效果加成：舱载单位射程增加3。
Tooltip.enUS:
Defense Building
A basic defense building capable of loading infantry.

Effect bonus: The range of the mounted unit is increased by 3.

Tooltip.zhCN:
防御建筑
特战队主要防空建筑。

可以对空。
侦测单位
Tooltip.enUS:
Defense Building
The main air defense building of the special forces.

Can be empty.
Detection unit

Tooltip.zhCN:
防御建筑
能够在大范围内显示周围敌方单位的位置。
侦测单位
Tooltip.enUS:
Defensive buildings
can display the positions of surrounding enemy units in a wide range.
Detection unit
Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
解锁高级步兵单位。

开启：
- 可以在特战兵营中训练特战幽灵
Tooltip.enUS:
Tech Building
Unlock advanced infantry units.

Enable:
- Can be trained in Special Forces BarracksSpecial War Ghost

Name.enUS: Construction of Special Warfare Heavy Factory

Tooltip.zhCN:
生产建筑
特战队机械地面单位生产设施。

开启：
- 恶火游骑兵
- 恶蝠游骑兵
- 强击歌利亚
- 幻光战车
- 使特战SCV可以建造特战星港
- 使特战SCV可以建造特战军械库
Tooltip.enUS:
Production Building
Special Forces Mechanical Ground Unit Production Facility.

Enable:
- Fire Ranger
- < c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Badbat Rangers
- Goliath
- Light Chariot
- Allows Special Combat SCV to build Special Combat Starport
- Enables Special Warfare SCV to be constructedSpecial Warfare Armory

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
解锁特战队终极地面机械单位。

开启：
- 可以在特战重工厂中制造突袭雷神
Tooltip.enUS:
Technology Building
Unlocks the ultimate ground mechanized unit of Special Forces.

Enable:
- Can be crafted in Special Warfare Heavy FactoryAssault on Thor

Tooltip.zhCN:
生产建筑
特战队空中单位生产设施。

开启：
- 德摩斯维京战机
- 隐秘女妖
- 特别行动运输机
- 使特战SCV可以建造特战聚变芯体
Tooltip.enUS:
Production Building
Special Forces air unit production facility.

Enable:
- Deimos Viking
- Stealth Banshee
- Special Ops Transport
- UseSpecial Warfare SCV can build Special Warfare Fusion Core

Name.zhCN: 建造特战聚变芯体
Name.enUS: Construction of Special Warfare Fusion Core

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
解锁特战队终极空中单位。

开启：
- 可以在特战星港中制造莫莱级战列巡航舰
Tooltip.enUS:
Technology Building
Unlocks the ultimate air unit of Special Forces.

Enable:
- Can be crafted in Special Warfare StarportMolay-class battlecruiser
Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.

Tooltip.zhCN: 正在极快的恢复生命。
Tooltip.enUS: Recovering life very quickly.
